extendedInfo.description: Frank always wanted to fly! Help Frank reach for the stars in this incredibly cute and dazzingly fun game. Launch Frank from his slingshot by dragging back the rubberband and catapult him into space. Use your arsenal of powerful fruits and jetpacks to help Frank reach new heights. Along his way Frank will encounter a variety of monsters that might help him to travel further. ã» EXPERIENCE REAL 3D WITH 3D GLASSES Airbag Frank features real 3D rendering that pops up of the screen, all you need is a pair of anaglyph 3D glasses: red/blue, cyan/magenta and yellow/blue are supported. ã» MEET THE MONSTERS There are many unique monsters to discover in Airbag Frank. When Frank lands on a crunch, he can ride on his back for a short time. Or steal the balloon from a skullorm and fly away with it. ã» MORE THAN 30 UNLOCKABLES Improve your reach by unlocking better slingshots, new fruits, monsters, costumes, jetpacks and more. There are over 30 items to unlock and buy in the Airbag Frank shop. ã» FEATURE COMPLETE FREE VERSION Yes! This is game is free, but there is not a single feature missing. But we do have a gold version that you can buy for the price of candy bar if you want to support the developers and ensure continued development of Airbag Frank. ã» IN-APP PURCHASE FREE Yes, the game is free and you don't need to buy additional content to actually make it playable. The game does not even has the option of in-app purchasing, so you can let your kids play without worrying that they will spend all your hard earned money. ã» OPTIMIZED FOR THE LATEST DEVICESThe game looks great on all devices but if you're one of the lucky owners of one of the latest devices you can enjoy highly detailed models with realtime shadows and more special effects! ã» FUN! FUN! FUN! Watch the Airbag Frank 3D trailer on http://www.drahtwerk.biz/AirbagFrank Follow us on Twitter for the latest updates about Airbag Frank 3D and drahtwerk: http://twitter.drahtwerk.biz

reviews.title: Simple but entertaining.
reviews.comment: Fun little timewaster.  Would be nice to be able to zoom out.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Not working!!!
reviews.comment: Wont work on my galaxy s2. It just froze on me right when i start it up. So far not a good game.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: KlamPs says A-Okay!
reviews.comment: This game is completely addictive and should be picked up by everybody so that the lady in this window at the DMV can give me my new license!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Very fun
reviews.comment: I now have every power-up, and its still fun to try to beat my high scores!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Superb
reviews.comment: Highly addictive, excellent fun. Best game I\'ve played in ages!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: It\'s good
reviews.comment: Needs a power up magnet or Frank or the power ups need to be larger cause sometimes you can fly a whole run without hitin anythin. Also, the stuff on the floor is pretty ineffectual. They need greater strength, some of them actually slow you down even though they let you carry on.
reviews.author: Matthew Stott

reviews.title: Addictive little time waster...
reviews.comment: Lots of fun to boot too. Simple mechanics are often the recipe for a great game. This one oozes with charm. Great work dev guy!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great graphics, limited engagement
reviews.comment: Basically an expansion of the old \"Kitten Cannon\" concept, brings a lot of laughs without taxing the brain too much.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: It\'s a pretty cool game... you can\'t really shoot straight up and down though not that you want to.. but if you\'re looking for something to take up sometime and keep you occupied this is a good 1.
reviews.author: Jesse Conner

reviews.title: Fun
reviews.comment: A great time killer but I have bought every upgrade already.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good game
reviews.comment: Gets boring once everything is unlocked. More jelly the more stuff you have. You don\'t collect anything when falling. Plus would be cool if you see frank go into space. As I spend most of the time at 5000+ altitude.
reviews.author: kevin didlick

reviews.title: excellent
reviews.comment: i always have a great time while playing it though it closes sometimes...still i like it
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Not too great
reviews.comment: You don\'t do anything other than sling the character once, and that\'s as far as the controls go. Not really a game, you just watch him bounce off of things. Nice graphics that you don\'t really see while flying through clouds most of the time. You get broccoli n tomatos which seemingly do nothing in the game. Lots of room for improvement.
reviews.author: Jon Lambert

reviews.title: So much FUN!
reviews.comment: This game is great. Good thing i have 3D glasses but things dont pop out as i hoped they would.
reviews.author: Ryan Glick

reviews.title: Won\'t Download.
reviews.comment: Shows 100% on downloading screen but it will not install to my phone. I will give a 5 star rating when it can install to my phone.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fun
reviews.comment: My kids love this game. It was a lot of fun getting all the points for them so they can but all the stuff from the store.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great fun
reviews.comment: Love these type of games, so addictive it\'s unreal ha ha. Download or miss out.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: :( freeze
reviews.comment: This game overloads memory (I believe) and freezes my phone completely so I have to reset it.. Plus its a new model, Droid 4... In terms of the game, you just sit there and watch it, nothing to play
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: One of the worst games ive ever played
reviews.comment: Smh thears not much to do hes just flying A round. this game is wack ! I hate it! waste of time   um deleteing this game from my evo 3D. This game puts me to sleep.... But hay see for Ur self im sure Ull side u wilth  me
reviews.author: PreMaDona TomBoi

reviews.title: Fix the menus please
reviews.comment: Otherwise a perfect game but menus are a bit to big for the screen (I\'m not using any screen hacks or pa ROM)
reviews.author: A Google User
